content: स्तंभः [स्तंभ्-अच्] {@--1@} Fixedness, stiffness, rigidity, motionlessness; रंभा स्तंभं भजति <ls>Vikr. 18. 29</ls>; <ls>Ki. 12. 28</ls>; गात्रस्तंभः स्तनमुकुलयोरुत्प्रबंधः प्रकंपः <ls>Māl. 2. 5</ls>; तत्संकल्पोपहितजाडिम स्तंभमभ्योति गात्रं <ls n="Māl.">1. 35</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">4. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Insensibility, stupefaction, stupor, numbness, paralysis. {@--3@} Stoppage, obstruction, hindrance; सोऽ पश्यत्प्रणिधानेन संततेः स्तंभकारणं <ls>R. 1. 74</ls>; वाक्स्तंभं नाटयति <ls>Māl. 8.</ls> {@--4@} Restraint, curbing, suppressing; कृतश्चित्तस्तंभः प्रतिहतधियामजंलिरपि <ls>Bh. 3. 6.</ls> {@--5@} Prop, support, fulcrum. {@--6@} A pillar, column, post. {@--7@} A stem, trunk (of a tree). {@--8@} Stupidity. {@--9@} Absence of feeling or excitability. {@--10@} The suppression of any force or feeling by supernatural or magical means.
